title: Trump to exclude Democratic governors from usually bipartisan meeting at the White House
desc: President Trump is hosting an annual meeting with governors at the White House, but he will not invite any Democrats, only Republicans, breaking tradition.

title: Drinking 2-3 cups of coffee a day tied to lower dementia risk
desc: Caffeinated tea also found to slow cognitive decline in study.

title: First national plan to address violence against Indigenous women and children
desc: The first standalone national plan to tackle domestic violence against First Nations women and children was "hard fought for by Aboriginal women", an advocate says.

title: Gabriel Martinelli shares how Arsenal players really feel about Viktor Gyokeres behind the scenes
desc: Gabriel Martinelli has revealed that 'everyone' at Arsenal really loves Viktor Gyokeres and is trying to give him the tools to succeed.

title: Physical pressure on the brain triggers neurons’ self-destruction programming
desc: An interdisciplinary team of researchers from the University of Notre Dame is investigating the mechanisms of neuron death caused by chronic compression — such as the pressure exerted by a brain tumor — to better understand how to prevent neuron loss.

title: Olympic town warms as climate change puts Winter Games on thin ice
desc: The International Olympic Committee said last week it could move up the start date for future Winter Games to January from February because of rising temperatures.

title: Brazil: Scientists find heavy metals in food grown on soil from the Rio Doce estuary, an area affected by the Samarco dam collapse in 2015

title: Shafi Jan slams CM Punjab for ‘anti PTI’ comments

title: Decoding the nods to Latino culture in Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl performance
desc: From sugar cane fields to sparking electricity poles to a message of unity in small white writing, here are some of the messages in the Puerto Rican superstar’s performance you might have missed.
